-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Extends Haskell with binary literals.
--   
--   The Haskell'98 and Haskell'2010 standards define decimal, octal and
--   hexadecimal integer literals. Binary literals are conspicuously
--   missing. Here's a quasiquoter to remedy the situation.
@package binary-literal-qq
@version 1.0


-- | This module exports a quasiquoter for binary integer literals.
--   
--   Example usage:
--   
--   <pre>
--    import Language.Literals.Binary
--    import Data.Word
--   
--   not :: Word32 -&gt; Word32
--    not [b| 0 |] = [b| 1 |]
--    not [b| 1 |] = [b| 0 |]
--   </pre>
module Language.Literals.Binary
b :: QuasiQuoter
readBinary :: String -> Integer
